entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 40%
